incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. Start time : 09/12/2024 08:00 UTC End time : 09/12/2024 11:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to do a maintenance on multiple network equipment located in Chicago, Dallas, Montreal, New York City, San Jose, Toronto and Washington. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. Start time : 10/12/2024 06:00 UTC End time : 10/12/2024 16:30 UTC Service impact : During the configuration of One Network, customers may encounter response delays lasting up to 30 minutes The intervention on datacenter LIM/SBG will start at 06:00 UTC. The intervention on datacenter PAR will start at 08:00 UTC. The intervention on datacenter VIN/BHS will start at 10:00 UTC. The intervention on datacenter SGP will start at 13:00 UTC. The intervention on datacenter MUM will start at 16:00 UTC. Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform an operation on a network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 10/12/2024 07:00 UTC End time : 10/12/2024 19:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in this rack will be unreachable for 12 hours. Service improvement : Water manifold replacement Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 15/01/2025 13:00 UTC End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a downtime of up to 20 minutes for each intervention. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. We have carefully planned and scheduled the interventions to minimize any potential impact on your services. The maintenance schedule is as follows: BHS4 : Start of intervention at 13:00 UTC BHS5 : Start of intervention at 13:45 UTC BHS6 : Start of intervention at 15:00 UTC BHS7(first part) : Start of intervention at 15:45 UTC BHS7(second part) : Start of intervention at 16:30 UTC Thank you for your understanding.
